historicalPlaces.name: Kliptown
historicalPlaces.description: Kliptown is best known as the location for the 1955 Congress of the People. On June 26, 1955,3,000 representatives of all South African racial and ethnic groups gathered in the centre of Kliptown.

historicalPlaces.name: hector-Pieterson
historicalPlaces.description: The Hector Pieterson Museum is located in Orlando West, Soweto, South Africa. It is named in honor of Hector Pieterson, a schoolboy shot and killed during the 1976 Soweto uprising against apartheid.

historicalPlaces.name: Regina Mundi
historicalPlaces.description: Regina Mundi, designed by architect Anthony Noel Errol Slaven, is the largest Roman Catholic church in South Africa. It is located in Rockville, Soweto, Johannesburg.
